title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 82.1 - Restrictions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 82.1 - Restrictions

State Regulations

Hunting, trapping, fishing or trespassing for any purpose
whatsoever, except by cooperating landowners, lessees or members of their
immediate families, or persons acting with their consent, or the written
permission of the regional supervisor of the Department of Environmental

Conservation having jurisdiction or his agent, is prohibited within any area
posted with "restricted area" or "safety zone" signs. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
82.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
